title: The game keeps crashing and I was put in low priority queue.
body: When I started I game, the game crashed. And when it says client needs to repair. And it takes like 30 minutes to fix it. Then I started another game and the same problem occurred. Then I was put in low priority queue. I think this is unfair and since the client said the problem was fixed, and it keeps crashing and repairing the files. I am not supposed to be put in low priority queue and the game is still crashing. Can anyone help me with this?

replies.body: It's really important to take a break from matchmade games for now, and stick to custom games until this gets resolved.  When you say crash, are you getting any specific errors?  In the meantime, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well and see if a force repatch can help!
